title.narrative: Comic Books for Children's Rights - AEC

description.narrative:
Vulgarisation right of the child by means of comics This project 's part to use existing cultural channels, namely the comic to help get the message. Comics are for children and adults who can read of course. If there are few decades comics were a way to encourage college and high school students in reading, the drastic decline in the education budget and the resignation of the state made ##that is found in most libraries or schools which take place . They are in no doubt a privileged but also quite original channel to convey the message of human rights. To know the CDE by the children themselves end of 2015 with the participation of artists , designers, stage directors , storytellers this project aims to: # Select and train writers groups of childrenfor the promotion and defense of the rights of the child.
# Produce and publish comics based on the rights of the child.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
